issue.title: [Java] [Flight] FlightClient authenticateBasicToken should accept CallOptions as well
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10909](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10909). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In FlightClient, authenticateBasicToken API call currently does not accept CallOptions. To mirror other API calls in FlightClient, these two authentication methods should take in CallOptions (optional) as well. A method overload can be created for authenticateBasicToken, similar to authenticateBasic and authenticate.
